snippet: Nick Kyrgios served like a demon to bounce Serbia's world number two and top seed Novak Djokovic out of the quarter-finals of the Acapulco International with a 7-6(9) 7-5 victory on Thursday....

headline.main: Lillard Scores 33 as Trail Blazers Beat Thunder 114-109
headline.print_headline: Lillard Scores 33 as Trail Blazers Beat Thunder 114-109

lead_paragraph: Nick Kyrgios served like a demon to bounce Serbia's world number two and top seed Novak Djokovic out of the quarter-finals of the Acapulco International with a 7-6(9) 7-5 victory on Thursday.
